item.title: Duck DB and Pandas Profiling
item.description: Saw a nice introduction to Duck DB: https://shekhargulati.com/2019/12/15/the-5-minute-introduction-to-duckdb-the-sqlite-for-analytics/ Pandas Profiling for generating automatic data summary reports: https://github.com/ydataai/pandas-profiling
